major_cities.name: Galgenbeck
major_cities.description: A sprawling metropolis built atop the bones of countless civilizations. Its infamous Hanging Gardens sway with the corpses of the condemned, and the air is thick with the scent of rot and incense. The city is ruled by a secretive council, and its labyrinthine sewers are said to house ancient, unspeakable horrors.
notable_features: Ministry of Wealth & Taxes extracting souls as currency
City (Bone) Mill grinding bones to flour
major_cities.atmosphere: Urban decay, perpetual twilight, and the ever-present threat of betrayal.

major_cities.name: Allians
major_cities.description: An isolated city of scholars and mystics, Allians is built around a crumbling library said to contain the last true histories of the world. The city is shrouded in secrecy, and its towers are lit by ghostly blue flames.
major_cities.atmosphere: Scholarly, secretive, and haunted by knowledge.

major_cities.name: Graven-Tosk
major_cities.description: A city of graveyards and necromancers, Graven-Tosk is a place where the living and the dead intermingle. Bone fields stretch to the horizon, and the air is thick with the scent of incense and decay.
major_cities.atmosphere: Dark, funerary, and filled with the presence of the dead.
